maze.gui
Class CodeEditingPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent

                  maze.gui.CodeEditingPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, MenuControlled
public class CodeEditingPanel
extends javax.swing.JSplitPane
implements MenuControlled

Creates a robot AI script editor that allows the creation of Python scripts to control the AI robot.

Author:
Luke Last
